attributes.action: Stop spending British Tax payers money on Immigration! 5 million per day
attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to change the policy that lets this happen. We are an Island and control our own borders and the Government should act in our interests. 
Process offshore or make them apply from the Country there from.
attributes.background: We demand you stop wasting British Tax payers money on Immigration/immigrants! 5 million per day ( 1.8 Billion a year and rising each day) just on Accommodation. British people are struggling with the cost of living, schools are full, NHS is struggling, No dentists, No affordable housing!

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned with the costs associated with immigration but it's unclear what specific action you would like the Government to take.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to change. You may also like to sign the below petition we currently have open on the topic of reforms to the immigration process:

Implement reforms to deal with illegal immigration
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601727
